extensionDescription.message: 可定制的鼠标手势扩展，支持超过 60 种命令，还有摇摆手势、滚轮手势等额外功能。
extensionDescription.description: Customizable mouse gesture add-on, which supports over 60 different commands and additional features like rocker and wheel gestures.

addonUpdateNotificationMessage.message: 新版本号为 $VERSION$。点击此处查阅更新日志。
addonUpdateNotificationMessage.description: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.

settingDescriptionMouseButton.message: 触发鼠标手势的鼠标按键。
settingDescriptionMouseButton.description: The mouse button which triggers the gesture.

settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.message: 鼠标不动指定时间后，取消手势。
settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.description: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.

settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.message: 保持不动多少秒后取消当前手势。
settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.description: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.

settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.message: 按住时临时禁用鼠标手势的按键。
settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.description: Disables the mouse gesture if the key is pressed.

settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.message: 激活鼠标手势的最短距离。
settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.description: The minimum mouse distance until the Gesture gets activated.

settingDescriptionDistanceSensitivity.message: 认定为新方向的最短距离。这也影响轨迹平滑度。
settingDescriptionDistanceSensitivity.description: The minimum mouse distance until a new direction gets recognized. This will also impact the trace smoothness.

settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.description: Displays a trace along the mouse movement.

settingDescriptionTraceOpacity.message: 允许 0 (不可见) 至 1 (可见) 之间的任何值。
settingDescriptionTraceOpacity.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.description: Determines if the line thickness should grow.

settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.message: 显示匹配当前手势的命令（如果有）。
settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.description: Displays the command of the currently matching gesture if available.

settingDescriptionCommandBackgroundOpaci.message: 允许 0 (不可见) 至 1 (可见) 之间的任何值。
settingDescriptionCommandBackgroundOpaci.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.message: 允许的 CSS 单位: em, px, pt, %, vh 等。
settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionDisplayDirections.message: 在屏幕底部将当前手势以箭头标明。
settingDescriptionDisplayDirections.description: Displays the encoding of the gesture as arrows at the bottom of the screen.

settingDescriptionDirectionsFontSize.message: 允许的 CSS 单位: em, px, pt, %, vh 等。
settingDescriptionDirectionsFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionDirectionsBackgroundOp.message: 允许 0 (不可见) 至 1 (可见) 之间的任何值。
settingDescriptionDirectionsBackgroundOp.description: Accepts any value in the range of 0 (invisible) and 1 (visible).

settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.description: Shows a notification when Gesturefy is updated.

gestureTextInformation.message: 一个手势只能用下列方向的序列组成：↑ [上], ↓ [下], → [右], ← [左]，并且不能存在连续的相同方向，如 ↑↑。同一个手势不能分配给多个命令。
gestureTextInformation.description: A gesture is a sequence of the following directions: ↑ [up], ↓ [down], → [right], ← [left] and cannot contain the same direction twice in a row, as for example ↑↑. The same gesture can not be assigned to more than one command.

extraDescriptionRockerActive.message: 此手势为按住鼠标右键时单击鼠标左键，或者按住鼠标左键时单击鼠标右键。
extraDescriptionRockerActive.description: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.

extraDescriptionWheelActive.message: 按住滚轮手势按键时向上或向下滚动。
extraDescriptionWheelActive.description: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture trigger button.

extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.message: 触发滚轮手势的鼠标按键。
extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.description: The mouse button which triggers the wheel gesture.

extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.message: The minimal amount the mouse wheel must be scrolled until the gesture is triggered.
extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.description: The minimal amount the mouse wheel must be scrolled until the gesture is triggered.

blacklistTextInformation.message: 添加网址（URL）匹配模式来对特定网站禁用 Gesturefy。该匹配模式允许 "*" 通配符，并必须为 <scheme>://<host><path> 格式。
blacklistTextInformation.description: Add URL match patterns to disable Gesturefy for certain websites. The match pattern allows "*" wildcards and must be in the form of <scheme>://<host><path>.

blacklistPlaceholderURL.message: 输入 URL 匹配模式

aboutRestoreNotificationSuccess.description: The selected config has been successfully restored.

aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.message: 所选的文件不是有效的 Gesturefy 配置文件。
aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.description: The selected file is not a valid Gesturefy config file.

aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.message: 所选文件与所需的文件类型不匹配。
aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.description: The selected file does not match the required file type.

aboutResetNotificationAdditionalPermissi.message: This config file contains gestures that may require the acceptance of additional permissions.
aboutResetNotificationAdditionalPermissi.description: This config file contains gestures that may require the acceptance of additional permissions.

aboutResetNotificationConfirm.message: 包括手势在内的所有设置都将被重置。这无法撤销！
aboutResetNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures will be reset. This cannot be undone!

commandLabelFocusPreviousSelectedTab.message: 转至上一个选中的标签页

commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.message: 移动左侧标签页到新窗口
commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.description: Move left tabs to new window

commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.message: 移动右侧标签页到新窗口
commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.description: Move right tabs to new window

commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.message: 新建隐私窗口打开链接
commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.description: Open link in new private window

commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: 新建标签页打开自定义网址
commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Open custom URL in new tab

commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.message: 新建标签页打开剪贴板中的网址
commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.description: Open URL from clipboard in new tab

commandLabelSendMessageToOtherAddon.message: 发送消息到其他附加组件

commandDescriptionReloadFrame.message: 重新载入手势起始处的框架。
commandDescriptionReloadFrame.description: Reloads the frame where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionStopLoading.description: Stops the current page from loading.

commandDescriptionRestoreTab.message: 还原上一个被关闭的标签页。

commandDescriptionZoomIn.message: 放大当前标签页的内容。

commandDescriptionZoomOut.message: 缩小当前标签页的内容。
commandDescriptionZoomOut.description: Zooms out of the current tab.

commandDescriptionZoomReset.message: 重置当前标签页的缩放级别。

commandDescriptionPageBack.message: 返回历史记录中的上一个页面。
commandDescriptionPageBack.description: Returns to the previous page of the history.

commandDescriptionPageForth.message: 返回历史记录中的下一个页面。
commandDescriptionPageForth.description: Goes a page forward in the history.

commandDescriptionTogglePin.message: 固定或取消固定当前标签页。
commandDescriptionTogglePin.description: Pins or unpins the current Tab.

commandDescriptionToggleMute.message: 静音或取消静音当前标签页。
commandDescriptionToggleMute.description: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.

commandDescriptionScrollTop.description: Scrolls to the top of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollBottom.description: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.message: 向下滚动当前视窗的长度。
commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.description: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.message: 向上滚动当前视窗的长度
commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.description: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.message: 切换到当前标签页右侧的标签页。
commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.description: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.message: 切换到当前标签页左侧的标签页。
commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.description: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.message: 切换到最左侧的标签页。
commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.description: Switches to the far left tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.message: 切换到最右侧的标签页。
commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.description: Switches to the far right tab.

commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.message: 切换到上一个活动标签页。
commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.description: Switches to the last active tab.

commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.message: 切换最大化与正常的窗口大小。
commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.description: Switches between maximized and normal window size.

commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.description: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.

commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.message: 新建一个空的隐私浏览窗口。
commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.description: Opens a new empty private window.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.message: 移动当前标签页到标签栏的开头。
commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.description: Moves the current tab to the start of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.message: 移动当前标签页到标签栏的末尾。
commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.description: Moves the current tab to the end of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.message: 移动当前标签页到一个新窗口。
commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.description: Moves the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.message: 移动当前标签页左侧的所有标签页到一个新窗口。
commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.description: Moves all tabs to the left of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.message: 移动当前标签页右侧的所有标签页到一个新窗口。
commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.description: Moves all tabs to the right of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.message: 当前网址的层次结构向上一层
commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.description: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.

commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.description: Increases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.description: Decreases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.message: 新建一个标签页来打开手势起始点的图像。
commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.description: Opens the image, where the gesture started, in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.message: 新建标签页来打开选定的网址或手势起始点的链接。
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.message: 新建窗口来打开选定的网址或手势起始点的链接。
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new window.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.message: 新建隐私窗口来打开选定的网址或手势起始点的链接。
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new private window.

commandDescriptionSearchTextSelection.description: Starts a web search of the selected text.

commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.message: 网络搜索剪贴板中的文本
commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.description: Starts a web search of the clipboard text.

commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.message: 关闭右侧的所有标签页。
commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.description: Closes all tabs to the right side.

commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.message: 关闭左侧的所有标签页，固定标签页除外。
commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.description: Closes all tabs to the left side, excluding pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.message: 关闭所有标签页，当前标签页和固定标签页除外。
commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.description: Closes all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.message: 将当前页面另存为一个 PDF 文件。
commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.description: Saves the current page as a pdf file.

commandDescriptionSaveImage.message: 下载手势起始处的图像。
commandDescriptionSaveImage.description: Downloads the image, where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionSaveLink.message: 下载所选的网址或手势开始处的链接。
commandDescriptionSaveLink.description: Downloads either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionPrintTab.message: 弹出打印对话框以打印当前页面。
commandDescriptionPrintTab.description: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.

commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.message: 对当前页面打开打印预览。
commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.description: Opens the print preview of the current page.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: 新建一个标签页来打开指定的网址。
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Opens the specified URL in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.message: 在当前标签页来打开指定的网址。
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.description: Opens the specified URL in the current tab.

commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.message: 将当前的剪贴板文本插入到手势起始处的输入元素的光标网址。
commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.description: Inserts the current clipboard text at the caret position of the input element where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.message: 如果剪贴板中含有一个网址（URL），将会在当前标签页打开。
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.description: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in the current tab.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.message: 如果剪贴板中含有一个网址（URL），将会新建标签页打开。
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.description: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenAddonSettings.message: 打开 Gesturefy 设置页面。

commandDescriptionOpenLink.message: 打开所选的网址或手势开始处的链接。
commandDescriptionOpenLink.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionViewImage.message: 打开手势起始处的图像。
commandDescriptionViewImage.description: Opens the image where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.message: 将已选中或手势起始处的网址保存为一个书签。
commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.description: Saves either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, as a bookmark.

commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.message: 将当前查看的网站内容保存为一个图像。
commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.description: Saves the current visible website area as an image.

commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.message: 复制当前标签页的网址到剪贴板。
commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.description: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.message: 复制选中的网址或手势起始处的链接到剪贴板。
commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.description: Copies either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.message: 复制当前选中的文本到剪贴板。
commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.description: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyImage.message: 复制手势起始处的图像到剪贴板。
commandDescriptionCopyImage.description: Copies the image, where the gesture started, to clipboard.

commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.message: 新建页面打开当前页面的源代码。
commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.description: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.

commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.message: 打开一个弹出窗口，其中列出了当前打开的所有标签页，并可切换到其中一个标签页。
commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.message: 打开一个弹出窗口，其中列出了最近关闭的标签页，并可恢复其中一个。
commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.message: 打开一个弹出式菜单，其中包含已安装搜索引擎的列表，您可以用其中一个搜索引擎搜索选中文本。
commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all installed search engines and offers the possibility to search the selected text with one of them.

commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.message: 向另一个附加组件发送一个自定义消息。这可以调用其他附加组件的功能。
commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.description: Sends a custom message to another add-on. This allows the use of other add-ons functionality.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.message: 决定新标签页相对于当前标签页的位置。
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.description: Determines the position of the new tab relative to the current tab.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.message: 决定打开的标签页是否获得焦点。
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.description: Determines if the opened tab should gain focus or not.

commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.message: 决定下一个聚焦的标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.description: Determines which tab should be focused next.

commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.message: 决定是否关闭固定的标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.description: Determines if pinned tabs can be closed or not.

commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.message: 决定是否只恢复属于当前窗口的标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.description: Determines if only tabs which belong to the current window should be restored.

commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.message: 决定重新载入时是否重用缓存。
commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.description: Determines if the cache should be reloaded or not.

commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.message: 缩放步进的百分比。如果留空则使用默认设置。
commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.description: The zoom step in percentage. If left blank, the default zoom levels are used.

commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.message: 滚动动画的持续时间（毫秒）。
commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds the scroll animation should take.

commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.message: 决定是否将固定标签页视为最左侧的标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.description: Determines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.message: 决定如果没有选择网址或链接，是否打开一个空标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.description: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.message: 决定如果没有选择网址或链接，是否打开一个空窗口。
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.description: Determines if an empty window should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.message: 附加一个搜索文本的自定义搜索网址。如果省略，将使用浏览器的默认搜索引擎。
commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.description: A custom search URL to which the search text is appended. If omitted, the default browser search engine will be used.

commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.message: 决定是否应显示“另存为”对话框， 或将文件悄悄下载到用户默认的“下载”文件夹。
commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.description: Determines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the file should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.

commandSettingDescriptionCustomURL.description: The URL that should be opened.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.message: 消息发送的目标（附加组件的扩展 ID）。
commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.description: The extension ID of the add-on the message should be sent to.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.message: 发送到目标附加组件的消息字符串。
commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.description: The message string that should be sent to the add-on.

commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.message: 决定消息是否应该序列化为一个 JavaScript 对象。
commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.description: Determines if the message should be serialized as a JavaScript object.

commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.message: 按特定标准对显示的标签页排序。
commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.description: Orders the displayed tabs by a specific characteristic.

commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.message: 决定是否包含当前的活动标签页。
commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.description: Determines if the currently active tab should be included.

commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.message: 决定打开的窗口是否获得焦点。
commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.description: Determines if the opened window should gain focus or not.

commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.message: 无法打开目标网址。点击此处了解更多信息。
commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.description: The target URL cannot be opened. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.message: 无法将指定的消息字符串解析为一个 JavaScript 对象。点击此处了解更多信息。
commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.description: The specified message string could not be parsed to a JavaScript object. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.message: 指定的扩展 ID 不属于现有的附加组件，或者该附加组件不接收消息。点击此处了解更多信息。
commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.description: The specified extension ID either does not belong to an existing add-on or the add-on does not receive messages. Click here for more information.

gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.message: 使用鼠标$MOUSEBUTTON$来录制一个新手势。
gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.description: Use the right mouse button to record a new gesture.

gesturePopupMouseButtonLeft.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonRight.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonMiddle.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.message: 选择分配到此手势的命令。
gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.description: Choose a command that should be assigned to this gesture.

gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.message: 使用箭头按键输入方向，或者用右侧区域录制手势。
gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.description: Either use the arrow keys to enter the directions, or record them in the area next to it.

gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.message: 分配自定义的显示名称，代替命令名称。
gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.description: Assign a custom name that will be displayed instead of the command name.

gesturePopupDirectionsNotificationDuplic.description: This gesture is already in use by "$COMMAND$".

LinkReadWiki.message: 阅读 wiki 了解更多信息。
